website_summaries.verdict: The Vassell is one of the fixtures on the Skechers Diameter collection. This footwear has been in production for almost a decade, primarily due to the favorable responses it got from customers. Comfortable and light, the Diameter Vassell displays a classic and sporty silhouette that works best with casual clothing.There is a good number of regular users who complained about its durability. Still, with its colorways, style, and inexpensive price, the Skechers Diameter Vassell is a good addition to one's sneaker rotation.
pros: This casual lace-up sneaker has been commended by plenty of reviewers because of its exceptional traction
As per some purchasers, the classic look of the men's Skechers Diameter - Vassell has been pleasing
For a good number of wearers, this low-top feels adequately comfortable
The lightweight quality of this casual shoe is praised by a couple of users
A few purchasers noted that the Diameter Vassell's dark colorways look great with jeans or shorts
Some commenters liked the laces of this sneaker because it stays tightly tied most of the time
One buyer mentioned that he wore it for long hours without foot fatigue
The reasonable price of the Skechers Diameter - Vassell is admired by a number of shoppers
cons: Several buyers were critical of this Skechers footwear's durability as they said that its "falling apart" after a few months of use
The colors of the sneaker faded relatively quicker than expected, as shared by a purchaser
As per a couple of reviews, the arch support isn't very exceptional

customer_reviews.title: A Well Constructed, Hard-wearing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: A well-made comfy shoe. My third pair in fact which shows that I have full confidence in the brand. However, I do not understand why the black model cost considerably more than the brown? Nevertheless, the shoes last a long time and I find them good for wearing while driving and they are good value.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bluffield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect half size fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband's shoe size is a UK6.5, so we ordered these hopping they would be a good fit and they are perfect. He's not had these on outside yet, but they are very comfortable. I would definitely buy theses or similar again. It took a week to arrive from USA but the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to purchase women's brown trainers. When I saw these I was thrilled. Lovely looking trainers and nice colour. They are slightly wide fitting, but comfy. When I looked on the label, they are actually men's shoes, which I didn't notice when I purchased them. That is probably why they are wide fitting so it is my fault and not the manufacturer. I'm still keeping them though as I like them. I have several different pairs of sketchers and I am very pleased with them all
customer_reviews.author: Santessa

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Look good and are comfortable to wear, however unlike my light tan pair the leather on my dark pair has cracked, flaked and given away along the seams. Very disappointing given that they've been worn about 10% of the amount of the Tan pair I own. Really poor quality, not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe...but beware terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item just over 6 months ago, and have only worn them for very 'low intensity' uses - i.e. wearing around the office. They're very comfortable - like wearing a pair of slippers at work - but I've recently seen the seam around the front has completely seperated from the adjoining material (the stitching's still in place, the material's come away behind it). Very disappointing, particularly given how little they've been worn. Thought I'd got a bargain but it's true you get what you pay for :(
customer_reviews.author: avid fan

customer_reviews.title: My second pair and I would purchase again without a second thought.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first pair in New York, they lasted quite a few years and I was disappointed at having to throw them away as I had worn them out. I made sure I reordered the exact same ones, as we know some styles don't stay around for long, and I am very pleased to say the second pair are performing equally as well and going strong. They remain one of my favourites for walking and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: JohnSG55

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE SKETCHER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking shoe that fits well and is comfortable. I have bought several pairs of Sketcher over the last few years and have always been happy with my purchase. Sketcher shoes always look smart. This shoe is ideal if you want a trainer style shoe that looks good and a bit more expensive. My only slight criticism is that although the sole areas last well, the heal wears down a bit too quickly. However that may be down to the way I walk as I do have this problem with some other shoes. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Devon Al

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a big discount but anyway worths the money. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: CyberWolf

customer_reviews.title: Watch the price
customer_reviews.text: Noticed the price went up a fair bit in fact the next day by £ 37. 00
customer_reviews.author: charles smith

customer_reviews.title: it is very comfortable especially with the memory foam soles and looks very ...
customer_reviews.text: it is very comfortable especially with the memory foam soles and looks very stylish with the cream laces. This is not however the best sports shoes, at least not for me, I use it more for casual use and it goes well with other sets of clothing. The shoe feels high quality and is worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Zafar

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great look, not a bad price. I usually have problems with width but not with these. This is my second pair, the first was purchased quite a few years ago. After my wife asked if I would get rid of them stating they were looking tired. Bought these but couldn't part with originals, too good and comfortable like a second skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of Sketchers ever since I purchased a pair in Cebu, Philippines years ago. They only died on my last May. They seem a little narrow at the moment, but I'm sure they will widen out with wear. Now to find some decent cargo pants and 3/4 length cargo shorts to complete the ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: Steve. R .Young

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from Begg Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Loved the hand written note that came with the order from staff member at Begg Shoes, Lerwick. A nice personal touch. Well done, customer service at it's best.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned casual trainers
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a decent pair of casual trainers with lace ups and with cushion insoles as well
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable for daily use. I will recommend it to anyone walking long distance in summer.
customer_reviews.author: johnjohn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality
customer_reviews.text: very pleased my husband is quite fussy when it comes to his feet but was very pleased with these
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and look good
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable and look good too. Strangely they remind me of football boots and when I look at them they actually take me back to my younger days when I was a good player. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: RHDt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes and very comfortable. I have two pairs but whatever you do make sure to size down if you are a half size as they are slightly on the big size.
customer_reviews.author: rjj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, well made, durable shoes that, like all Skechers, are a size too small compared to standard UK sizes. Buy one size up and they should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Skechers shoes at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are very true to size. Unfortunately had ordered larger size as my son always has to get something bigger so that it vaguely fits - but we now know that Skechers shoes are very accurate in their sizing.
customer_reviews.author: stiltz

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, really looks fantastic, never looked at these before, saw them in a shop for lots more and really liked them, very cool. Searched on Amazon and purchased as made saving around £10-£15 less than retail shop. Shoe appears wide fitting which suits me and to be little critical, the sole not as cushned as thought. Delivered within 3-days so good service
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: As usual Skechers - love them
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased Skechers shoes and trainers for my husband on numerous occasions and these again do not disappoint. Size as expected and quality as good as ever. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Would certainly recommend it to anyone who is interested in Sketchers footwear. This footwear is of good quality and and also very nice stiching as well as colour.
customer_reviews.author: madnan71

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Normally take size 10 but the size 9 were perfect. Really comfortable even on first wear. Look good too. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsV

customer_reviews.title: Comfy !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes wearing them straight from the box no wear in at all, only get 1 pair of feet so why not treat them - well worth the money & great customer service from Amazon as usual !
customer_reviews.author: P Cook

customer_reviews.title: Durable, attractive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Continuing my husband's love affair with his Skechers, these are now his favourite footwear for gardening and outdoor tasks. Price is good for the quality and comfort offered.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Royal

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my nephew who has sensitive feet! He loved them instantly. And says " they are super comfortable". A very smart/casual shoe. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Otis' Mummy

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers... Nice looking and very comfortable footwear because of the high quality lining and soles and usually well priced. 100% worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: cragz

customer_reviews.title: sketchers shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are the second pair of sketchers I brought for my son, they fit perfect and comfortable he wears them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Baker

customer_reviews.title: Insole design takes getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice fit, but weird insole. The heal has a cushion that makes it feel as though there is a lump. Get used to it after a while, but not a fan of the insole design
customer_reviews.author: Kierank

customer_reviews.title: Large fitting!
customer_reviews.text: My husband normaly takes shoe size 7 but had to exchange for size 6.5 which are a good fit, light in weight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jendon

customer_reviews.title: So far-so good
customer_reviews.text: Having bought shoes on the net previously and being dissapointed I thought I would have another go. I was not to be dissapointed I put them on and ended up wearing them for the rest of the day. They were so comfortable and light but at the same time giving great support.
customer_reviews.author: Hoard Tinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from day one, have really grown to like Skechers and the price is exceptional. They wear well and look good too. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Roper

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have owned, the first pair still going strong but the sole is wearing a little thin after two years. I can't fault these shoes, light, strong and vert comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Gledhill

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my other half for Xmas. They're really good quality, stylish shoes, which he finds very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Emma Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: size issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes a size larger than normal, since reading a review which warned of this problem . It seems that even this is not enough and it is about time the size discrepancy was sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: S Bower

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Using them for the work. 7 months and still no rips or dents. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Eddie2000

customer_reviews.title: I bought 43 Eur size and they fit like 44 size
customer_reviews.text: I sent back these shoes because they are too big, I bought 43 Eur size and they fit like 44 size. In the description there is regular fit, I have another kind of Skechers and they fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Riccardo

customer_reviews.title: A Great pair Of Trainers
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of trainers never look at any other brand.Arrived within 48 hours of ordering.I do a lot of walking and I get a good 6 months use out of a pair of these trainers.You can put them on straight out of the box and walk miles with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Firs class
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, perfect fit,First time for me to purchase Skechers footware and hopefully not the last time, delivery and package Firs class. Mol
customer_reviews.author: mol

customer_reviews.title: ... treat will update if they last for a bit good style
customer_reviews.text: Husband's treat will update if they last for a bit good style trendy
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Got these some time ago and they fit well and are comfortable for walking. They were keenly priced worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pj Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: You generally cant go wrong with Sketchers and they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: You generally cant go wrong with Sketchers and they fit well. I have had a pair similar to this and the sole wears out quite quickly but its a well made shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W

customer_reviews.title: says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: bought for partner he likes them, says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: rupert

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are very comfortable only time will tell how long they last
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was bang on time. The shoes are very comfortable only time will tell how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: MR C C Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable casual shoe. Just what I wanted and a very good price too. Would recommend for every day wearing.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: great design but they wear quickly and become scruffy looking and loose.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a good product delivered promptly and a very good fit.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have only worn them the once sofar, but they are extremely comfortable

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: lovely shoes will purchase again and the look in also very nice.

customer_reviews.title: and very happy with
customer_reviews.text: They are just as I expected .and very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Banham

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and stylish, wear all day and your feet feel fresh. They look durable and seem very well made.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comfy
customer_reviews.text: Get more and more comfy the more you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: ren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Brought these to work in. Really comfy and look quite pleasing. If you want a durable shoe, go with these.
customer_reviews.author: eddieh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great but they are very poorly made, after only wearing a couple of times seams have started coming apart at certain parts of the shoe. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Not me.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Look great, very comfortable and good sizing, no squeaking like certain shoes of this type do on certain floor types. I will certainly be buying Skechers again. Would highly recommend you buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband we opted for a half size smaller as american sized! Perfect fit. Would buy again, great service. Xx
customer_reviews.author: morag wood

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Yet again. . Not let down by sketchers . Great fit and comfort .. wouldn't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delighted in every respect, now my third pair over the past few years, and these are the best.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Look good. My husband loves them. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline Marriner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from Day 1
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of these shoes. Comfortable from Day 1. I go walking in them. I got over 750 miles in the previous pair!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: With skechers you always get a good quality product and it is the same with trainers, very comfortable to wear

customer_reviews.title: Casual but smart
customer_reviews.text: Had several pairs of Skechers in the past and so far these are the best pair I have had. Hoping they last as long as the others.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, comfortable and hard wearing
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I am on my 5th pair as they fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: rocowa-21

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! Arrived on time and fits perfectly. I didn't know it comes with memory foam which is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: ismail

customer_reviews.title: good fit very comfortable to wear for long periods
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, good fit very comfortable to wear for long periods, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Comfort from 1st wear
customer_reviews.text: Have already had a pair of Skechers that were comfortable from day one. Nothing to dislike and even came with a spare pair of laces.
customer_reviews.author: Neil CS

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoes
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shoes, love the design of the shoes. The price is about wright with free delivery. would recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, 8hrs first day with no problems. Used for general work ware. Sole can squeak on some smooth floors.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J Pepper

customer_reviews.title: stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the styling of Sketchers shoes. I bought the same shoe in two different colours! They are soft and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: John Causton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good prompt delivery, nice comfortable footwear with memory foam insole.
customer_reviews.author: AREF VACHHIAT

customer_reviews.title: Wider fitting they fit like gloves. Plus I like the way they put ...
customer_reviews.text: Fifth pair of Skechers I have purchased. Wider fitting they fit like gloves. Plus I like the way they put a second pair of laces in.
customer_reviews.author: mrs j worthington

customer_reviews.title: so far the shoes are OK
customer_reviews.text: I have had the shoes for 3 weeks and so far they are OK, lets see how long they will last :)
customer_reviews.author: Jiri Vapenik

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: Of my 4 skecher shoes all have been extremely consistent in sizing and these were no different. They broke in easily and the shoes are now nice and soft feeling. The insoles have quite a good amount of padding under the heels. Unlike some skechers they don't have too many lace holes and they pull tight very easily. Mine came with spare laces (slightly lighter in colour). Only problem is that the patterned tread is tailor made to pick up gravel from a fine gravel topped path or drive so I am forever picking stones out.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough but nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are are quite smart, but feel surprisingly light considering they are leather. The soles/tread feels more plastic than rubber and are relatively thin. This also keeps the shoe light and leads me to a slight concern that these lightweight materials may not turn out to be long lasting. The memory foam inner sole appears to be all around the heel end of the shoe which means that there is little padding under the ball of the foot, and the thiness of the remaining sole becomes very apparent and you can feel stones under foot. The shoes are supplied with a spare pair of laces in a different colour which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Bearman

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but very high insoles
customer_reviews.text: They're not bad - look ok, nice fit - but the insoles come up quite high, almost like rocker bottoms / shape-ups, and consequently they tend to tire my leg muscles out a bit when I walk for a fairly long distance in them. If you want to try 'mild' shape-ups, then go for these. Otherwise, stick to something with a lower insole.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: He seemed happy with the fit
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our son who tried them on at the weekend. He seemed happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Roger H

customer_reviews.title: Oversize I
customer_reviews.text: Looked fine but much too large. Exchanging for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: not like all the other Skechers I have had backs are ...
customer_reviews.text: not like all the other Skechers I have had backs are to low, not a nice feel and don't feel as well made as my past Skechers, wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Geordie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only way for a small footed person to shop
customer_reviews.author: The boss

customer_reviews.title: Need breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Look great - bit hard on the foot on long walks (so i'm told) but otherwise well made!
customer_reviews.author: BusyMum

customer_reviews.title: Very very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality...Don't waste money on this.There is already a big split on the side of one the shoe within 4 months of very moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Riz

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: After previously having Sketchers this pair really disappointed - in less than 6 months of not excessive wear the seams started to split on the outside. These were really poorly made. Just showing a photo of the worst split but there are two other splits as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Graham Dughan

customer_reviews.title: Total pants!
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and slippery in wet conditions! Worst sketcher shoe ever!
customer_reviews.author: moo moo

customer_reviews.title: Skechers shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the shoes but I ordered the wrong style by mistake! It's for my brother's Christmas present, ordered the ones without laces - so much more stylish!
customer_reviews.author: lisa stanley

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Diameter-Vassell Oxford
product_meta.description: Sporty good looks and comfort go into the skechers diameter - vassell shoe. Smooth leather upper in a lace up casual sneaker with stitching, overlay and perforation accents. Contrast colored side stripes.
